long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Redigate is both an offline and an online editor with Dropbox, Google Drive and local file integration.

Built on top of the ace editor it offers many features such as code higlighting, syntax checking, autocompletion, drag and drop and many more features and options to choose from. 

When choosing options there is a "preview" editor, this allows you to visually see the changes that the different options apply to the editors.

Redigate includes Go To any file and any line, a command palette with all available commands. Dynamic and resizable pane's

The future:

Add more language modes.
Google Drive and Github integration.

Syntax checking only available to a selected number of languages. 

/* 1.0.0 and 1.0.1 Fixes*/
Bug fixes
/* 0.6.2 Fixes*/
Added Google Drive
Fixed some button bugs
Improved fuzzy search
Fixed some bugs in the file tree and other bugs
/* 0.6 Initial Release*/
